sentences.english: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. 2. Brick quiz whangs veldt fox.
sentences.chinese: 關於磚頭的測驗把一隻跳躍的草原狐狸給難住了。

sentences.english: She pulled the brick and there was an ant. ( up )
sentences.chinese: 她撬起磚頭一看，發現下面有一隻螞蟻。

sentences.english: The solid rampart surrounded by moats boast as a iron-case with slab basements and bricks walls.
sentences.chinese: 天塹固壘並被吹噓爲鐵案板坯地下室牆壁和磚頭。

sentences.english: So, you're afraid you've bricked your router.
sentences.chinese: 所以，你害怕你已經用磚頭封你的路由器。

sentences.english: I took 3 from the site faster bricks together began to move.
sentences.chinese: 我從工地上拿了3快磚頭放在一起就開始搬了。

sentences.english: Instead, a brick smashed into② the Jag 's side door!
sentences.chinese: 相反，一塊磚頭卻撞在“美洲虎”的側門上。

sentences.english: Then he shouted towards there, knocked the bricks with a crowbar, but on response inside.
sentences.chinese: 用撬棍在磚頭上敲了幾下，裏面沒有任何迴應。

sentences.english: Brickbats and tiles, Say the bells of St. Giles 's.
sentences.chinese: 提到瓦片和磚頭，就數大鐘聖吉爾斯。

sentences.english: He was hurt by a falling brick.
sentences.chinese: 他被一塊落下的磚頭砸傷了。

sentences.english: I have seen bricks amid the oak copse there.
sentences.chinese: 我還看見過橡樹林中留存着的磚頭。

sentences.english: Hot bricks were put under the seats at the beginning of the trip.
sentences.chinese: 剛啓動時，燒熱的磚頭被放在旅客的座位底下。

sentences.english: It is a bricks and mortar industry that caters to the local market.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個有關磚頭與灰泥的行業，面向的是國內市場。

sentences.english: People are in a great hurry to move away the bricks and stones.
sentences.chinese: 人們正急急忙忙地搬開磚頭和石頭。

sentences.english: She pulled up the brick and there was an ant.
sentences.chinese: 她撬起一塊磚頭一看，發現下面有一隻螞蟻。

sentences.english: The workers stacked the bricks up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 工人把磚頭整齊地碼放在牆邊。

sentences.english: They picked up a brick and started hammering down the kitchen door.
sentences.chinese: 他們就撿起磚頭，砸廚房的門。
